mapper.select: select COUNT(GOODS_REVIEW_INDEX) from GOODS_REVIEW where GOODS_INDEX=#{goods_index}
mapper.update: UPDATE GOODS_REVIEW SET GOODS_REVIEW_VIEW = GOODS_REVIEW_VIEW+1 WHERE GOODS_REVIEW_INDEX=${goods_review_index}
mapper.insert: insert into GOODS_REVIEW values(GOODS_REVIEW_INDEX_SEQ.nextval, #{member_name}, ${goods_index}, SYSDATE, ${goods_review_rating}, null, #{goods_review_subject}, #{goods_review_content}, null, 0)
